description: Chronoview Analogue Watchface for Android Wear.  An analogue style watchface for Android Wear.Dials can be configured to display: Seconds,Day,Day of Week,Step Count,Wind Speed,Wind DirectionPressure,Temperature,Watch Battery,Phone Battery,Forecast,Humidity.Configuration options can be accessed through Android Wear on your phone and click on the Gear Icon.Weather Information is Supplied by OpenWeatherMap.
descriptionHTML:
Chronoview Analogue Watchface for Android Wear.

An analogue style watchface for Android Wear.

Dials can be configured to display:

Seconds,
Day,
Day of Week,
Step Count,
Wind Speed,
Wind Direction
Pressure,
Temperature,
Watch Battery,
Phone Battery,
Forecast,
Humidity.

Configuration options can be accessed through Android Wear on your phone and click on the Gear Icon.

Weather Information is Supplied by OpenWeatherMap.
